When she was old enough, she began to study magic herself, determined to become the greatest wizard in the world.

personality_description: Fabien Fel is an idealistic person who believes in equality for all. He can be stubborn at times and has strong faith. He is introverted and resourceful.
background_story: Fabien Fel grew up on the streets of Athkatla, the capital of Amn. He was always a small child, and was picked on because of it. When he was thirteen, he decided he'd had enough. He started to learn how to pick pockets and fight dirty. He quickly became the best in his gang. When he was sixteen, he tried to rob a nobleman. He was caught and brought before the City Watch. He expected to be executed, but instead was given a choice: join the City Watch or go to prison. He chose the City Watch. He proved to be a natural at being a rogue, and quickly rose through the ranks. He's now one of the City Watch's best. He's still small, but he's learned to use that to his advantage. He's also learned to control his temper, and is known for being calm in a crisis.

Junette's aggressive behavior can be off-putting to some, but those who know her well know that it is simply her nature to be bold and outspoken.
background_story: Junette Riktorara was born to a small family of farmers in the Forgotten Realms. When she was five, her parents were killed by a band of orcs who raided her village. However, he can be impatient and sometimes doesn't give people the time they need to change. He is fiercely independent and doesn't like anyone telling him what to do. background_story: Rockwell A was once a member of a druidic circle that sought to protect the natural world from the destruction wrought by civilization. However, when Rockwell saw the suffering caused by the circle's actions, he could no longer continue with their methods. He left the circle and struck out on his own, using his druidic magic to help those in need, regardless of whether they were friend or foe. This eventually led him to become an Outlander, a druid who is not bound to any one place. He now wanders the Forgotten Realms, helping those he comes across and searching for a way to end the suffering of all.
